Name: ro-RO
Description: Sample jurisdiction
SourceCode:
COMPUTE FEE BasicNationalFee
YIELD 320 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 128 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 64 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE SearchFee
CASE SituationType EQ PreparedIPEA AS
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCASE
CASE SituationType EQ PaidAsISA AS
YIELD 140 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 56 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 28 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCASE
CASE SituationType EQ PreparedISA AS
YIELD 540 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 216 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 108 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCASE
YIELD 700 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 280 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 140 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE ExaminationFee
CASE SituationType EQ PreparedIPEA AS
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 0 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCASE
YIELD 800 IF EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD 360 IF EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD 160 IF EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE SheetFee
LET A AS 420
LET B AS 420
LET C AS 420
YIELD ROUND(A*((SheetCount-100)/50)) IF SheetCount GT 100 AND EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD ROUND(B*((SheetCount-100)/50)) IF SheetCount GT 100 AND EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD ROUND(C*((SheetCount-100)/50)) IF SheetCount GT 100 AND EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE ClaimFee
YIELD (480*ClaimCount) IF ClaimCount GT 3 AND EntityType EQ NormalEntity
YIELD (192*ClaimCount) IF ClaimCount GT 3 AND EntityType EQ SmallEntity
YIELD (96*ClaimCount) IF ClaimCount GT 3 AND EntityType EQ MicroEntity
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-EP
Description: PCT regional phase in Europe
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-EP-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: EPO
# Valid until 31/03/2023
# Currency: EUR
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; ISA; IPRP

DEFINE NUMBER SheetCount AS 'Number of sheets?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 100000
DEFAULT 15
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 100
DEFAULT 15
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE MULTILIST VAL_CTY AS 'Select validation countries'
CHOICE VAL_NONE AS 'NONE'
CHOICE VAL_CD AS 'Cambodia'
CHOICE VAL_MA AS 'Morocco'
CHOICE VAL_MD AS 'Republic of Moldova'
CHOICE VAL_TN AS 'Tunisia'
DEFAULT VAL_NONE
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE BOOLEAN Extension AS 'Designate Bosnia and Herzegovina?'
DEFAULT FALSE
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 130
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_DesignationFee
YIELD 630
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExtensionFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 102 IF Extension EQ TRUE
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_SheetFee
YIELD 16*(SheetCount-35) IF SheetCount GT 35
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
LET CF1 AS 250
LET CF2 AS 630
YIELD CF1*(ClaimCount-15) IF ClaimCount GT 15 AND ClaimCount LT 51
YIELD CF2*(ClaimCount-50) + CF1*(ClaimCount-15-(ClaimCount-50)) IF ClaimCount GT 50
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_SearchFee
LET SF1 AS 1390
LET SF2 AS 1185

YIELD 0 IF ISA EQ ISA_EPO
YIELD SF1-SF2 IF ISA EQ ISA_AT OR ISA EQ ISA_FI OR ISA EQ ISA_NPI OR ISA EQ ISA_ES OR ISA EQ ISA_SE OR ISA EQ ISA_TR OR ISA EQ ISA_VI
YIELD SF1 IF ISA EQ ISA_NONE
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee
LET ExFee1 AS 1955
LET ExFee2 AS 1750
LET Discount AS 0.75

CASE IPRP EQ IPRP_EPO AS # discount scheme if EPO has prepared IPRP (Chapter II)
YIELD ExFee1*Discount IF ISA EQ ISA_EPO 
YIELD ExFee2*Discount IF ISA NEQ ISA_EPO
ENDCASE

CASE IPRP NEQ IPRP_EPO AS # no discount scheme
YIELD ExFee1 IF ISA EQ ISA_EPO
YIELD ExFee2 IF ISA NEQ ISA_EPO
ENDCASE

ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ValidationFee_CD
YIELD 180 IF VAL_CD IN VAL_CTY
ENDCOMPUTE
COMPUTE FEE OFF_ValidationFee_MA
YIELD 240 IF VAL_MA IN VAL_CTY
ENDCOMPUTE
COMPUTE FEE OFF_ValidationFee_MD
YIELD 200 IF VAL_MD IN VAL_CTY
ENDCOMPUTE
COMPUTE FEE OFF_ValidationFee_TN
YIELD 180 IF VAL_TN IN VAL_CTY
ENDCOMPUTE

# need to check if 3rd annuity is due (>1.5 years after filing date)
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal3
LET RenFee AS 505
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW_FROMLASTDAY) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD RenFee IF RenMonth GTE 18
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AE
Description: PCT national phase in UAE
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AE-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: UAE
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: AED
# MODULES: Application Date;

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 2000 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Person
YIELD 1000 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 800 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Person
YIELD 400 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person
ENDCOMPUTE

# Annuities are due as of the first anniversary based on the filing date (not end of the month)
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 800 #for year 2 (assumption: the NPE will always occur a year after filing date)
YIELD 840 IF RenMonth GTE 12 #year 3
YIELD 880 IF RenMonth GTE 24 #year 4
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AG
Description: PAT national phase in Antigua & Barbuda
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AG-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: Antigua & Barbuda
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: XCD
# MODULES: Application Date

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 800
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
YIELD 10*(ClaimCount-20) IF ClaimCount GT 20
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee
YIELD 75
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 1000+50 #Fee for grant + Fee for publication of grant of patent
ENDCOMPUTE

# Annuities are due as of the first anniversary based on the filing date (not end of the month)
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 200 #for year 2 (assumption: the NPE will always occur a year after filing date)
YIELD 300 IF RenMonth GTE 12 #year 3
YIELD 400 IF RenMonth GTE 24 #year 4
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AO
Description: PCT national phase in Angola
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AO-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: Angola
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: AOA
# MODULES: Application Date;

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 15
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 27722
YIELD 792*(ClaimCount-15) IF ClaimCount GT 15
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee OPTIONAL
#examination fee payable within 3 years of IFD
YIELD 27280
ENDCOMPUTE

# Annuities are due as of the first anniversary based on the filing date (not end of the month)
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 3784 #for 1st anniversary (assumption: the NPE will always occur a year after filing date)
YIELD 4050 IF RenMonth GTE 12 #2nd anniversary
YIELD 4400 IF RenMonth GTE 24 #3rd anniversary
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AP
Description: PCT regional phase in ARIPO
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AP-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: ARIPO
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: USD
# MODULES: Application Date; ISR_AVAILABLE

# Examination request: 3 years as of international filing date

DEFINE NUMBER CountryCount AS 'Number of designations?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 22
DEFAULT 22  # number of ARIPO member states
# Botswana, Eswatini, Gambia, Ghana, Kenya, Lesotho, Liberia, Malawi, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, Sao Tome and Principe, Sierra Leone, Somalia (not member of the Harare Protocol), the Sudan, the United Republic of Tanzania, Uganda, Zambia and Zimbabwe
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER SheetCount AS 'Number of sheets?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 10000
DEFAULT 30
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 232
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_DesignationFee
YIELD 85*CountryCount
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee
YIELD 350
YIELD 20*(SheetCount-30) IF SheetCount GT 30
YIELD 50*(ClaimCount-10) IF ClaimCount GT 10
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_SearchFee
YIELD 0 IF ISR_AVAILABLE EQ TRUE
YIELD 300 IF ISR_AVAILABLE EQ FALSE
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee
YIELD 300 # 3 years as of international filing date
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 350
ENDCOMPUTE

# need to check if due (1-3 years after filing date)
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 50 # year 1
YIELD 70 IF RenMonth GTE 12 # year 2
YIELD 90 IF RenMonth GTE 24 # year 3
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT_AU
Description: Entry of national phase in Australia
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AU-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Australia
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: AUD
# MODULES: IPRP (IPER)

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 370
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee OPTIONAL #Ex Request within 5 years of IFD
YIELD 300 IF IPRP EQ IPRP_AU
YIELD 490 IF IPRP NEQ IPRP_AU
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AZ
Description: Entry of national phase in Azerbaijan
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AZ-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Azerbaijan
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: AZN
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; EntitySize; IndependentClaimCount

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 20
ENDCOMPUTE 

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
YIELD 7 * (IndependentClaimCount-1) IF IndependentClaimCount GT 1
YIELD 7 * (ClaimCount-10) IF ClaimCount GT 10
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today

CASE RenMonth GTE 24 AS
   YIELD 50 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Person
   YIELD 10 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person
ENDCASE

ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AM
Description: Entry of national phase in Armenia
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AM-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: Armenia
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: AMD
# MODULES: EntitySize

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 5
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER SheetCount AS 'Number of sheets?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 10000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER PriorityCount AS 'Number of priorities?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 999
DEFAULT 1
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
LET Fee AS 20000
YIELD Fee
YIELD -Fee*0.75 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 
YIELD -Fee*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
LET Fee AS 5000
CASE ClaimCount GT 5 AS
YIELD Fee*(ClaimCount-5)
YIELD -Fee*(ClaimCount-5)*0.75 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 
YIELD -Fee*(ClaimCount-5)*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCASE
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PriorityFee
LET Fee AS 10000
YIELD Fee*PriorityCount
YIELD -Fee*PriorityCount*0.75 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 
YIELD -Fee*PriorityCount*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
LET Fee AS 15000
YIELD Fee
YIELD -Fee*0.75 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 
YIELD -Fee*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee OPTIONAL
#per sheet >25
LET Fee AS 2500
CASE SheetCount GT 25 AS
   YIELD Fee*(SheetCount-25)
   YIELD -Fee*(SheetCount-25)*0.75 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25
   YIELD -Fee*(SheetCount-25)*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCASE
ENDCOMPUTE

# no annuities before grant
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
YIELD 0
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AT
Description: Entry of national phase in Austria
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AT-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: Austria
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: EUR
# MODULES: NONE

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER SheetCount AS 'Number of sheets?' #used only for optional publication fee
BETWEEN 1 AND 10000
DEFAULT 15
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 52 #entry fee
YIELD 50 #document fee
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_SearchExaminationFee
YIELD 292
YIELD 104*CEIL((ClaimCount-10)/10) IF ClaimCount GT 10
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 208
YIELD 135*CEIL((SheetCount-15)/15) IF SheetCount GT 15
ENDCOMPUTE

# Annuities payable only after grant
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
YIELD 0
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-AL
Description: Entry of national phase in Albania
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-AL-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: Albania
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: ALL
# MODULES: NONE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 7000
ENDCOMPUTE

#patents are granted without examination; within 10 years of NPE an examination report from another office must be filed to effect grant
COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 6000
ENDCOMPUTE

# no annuities before grant
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
YIELD 0
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-EA
Description: Entry of regional phase in Eurasia
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-EA-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: EAPO
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: RUB
# MODULES: ISR_AVAILABLE; IndependentClaimCount;

# all calculations for non EAPO residents. These would be entitled to certain fee reductions.

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 5
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
LET Fee AS 36000
YIELD Fee*0.75 IF ISR_AVAILABLE EQ TRUE
YIELD Fee IF ISR_AVAILABLE EQ FALSE
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee
LET Fee AS 40000
LET IndepClaimFee AS 13000
YIELD Fee
YIELD Fee IF IndependentClaimCount EQ 2
YIELD Fee  + IndepClaimFee*(IndependentClaimCount-2) IF IndependentClaimCount GT 2
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
LET CF1 AS 6500
LET CF2 AS 5200
LET CF3 AS 4800
# 1-5 = none; 6-20(=15): 4800; 21-50 (=30): 5200; >50: 6500
YIELD CF1*(ClaimCount-50) + CF2*30 + CF3*15 IF ClaimCount GT 50
YIELD CF2*(ClaimCount-20) + CF3*15 IF ClaimCount GT 20 AND ClaimCount LT 51
YIELD CF3*(ClaimCount-5) IF ClaimCount GT 5 AND ClaimCount LT 21
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 25000
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-OA
Description: Entry of regional phase in OAPI
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-OA-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT regional phase: OAPI
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: CFA (XAF)
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; PriorityCount;

DEFINE NUMBER SheetCount AS 'Number of sheets?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 10000
DEFAULT 30
ENDDEFINE

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 225000
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee
YIELD 365000
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PriorityFee
YIELD 63000 * PriorityCount
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
YIELD 45000 * (ClaimCount-10) IF ClaimCount GT 10
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE Off_AcceptanceFee  # 0 for 1-10 sheets
LET SF1 AS 120000
LET SF2 AS 300000
LET SF3 AS 600000
LET SF4 AS 80000

YIELD SF1*10 + SF2*10 + SF3*10 + SF4*((SheetCount-40)/10) IF SheetCount GT 40            # each additional set of 10 sheets > 40
YIELD SF1*10 + SF2*10 + SF3*(SheetCount-30) IF SheetCount GT 30 AND SheetCount LT 41  # 31-40 sheets 
YIELD SF1*10 + SF2*(SheetCount-20) IF SheetCount GT 20 AND SheetCount LT 31           # 21-30 sheets
YIELD SF1*(SheetCount-10) IF SheetCount GT 10 AND SheetCount LT 21                    # 11-20 sheets
ENDCOMPUTE

# need to verify with office if really payable upon entry
COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today

YIELD 220000 IF RenMonth GTE 12
YIELD 220000 IF RenMonth GTE 24

ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-BA

Name: PCT-BH
Description: Entry of national phase in Bahrain
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BH-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Bahrain
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BHD
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; EntitySize

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 270 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person
YIELD 540 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Person
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_PublicationFee
YIELD 160 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person
YIELD 320 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Person

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal

Name: PCT-BN
Description: entry of national phase in Brunei Darussalam
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BN-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Brunei Darussalam
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BND
# MODULES: NONE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 160

#no annuities due before year 5

Name: PCT-BR
Description: Entry of national phase in Brazil
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BR-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Brazil
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BRL
# MODULES: ApplicationDate

DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 100
DEFAULT 10
ENDDEFINE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 175
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee
YIELD 590  # 10 claims included; due date 36 months after IFD
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
LET CF1 AS 100
LET CF2 AS 200
LET CF3 AS 500

# between 10 and incl. 15 claims:
YIELD CF1*(ClaimCount-10) IF ClaimCount GT 10 AND ClaimCount LTE 15

# between 15 and incl. 30 claims
YIELD CF2*(ClaimCount-15) + CF1*5 IF ClaimCount GT 15 AND ClaimCount LTE 30

# above 30 claims
YIELD CF3*(ClaimCount-30) + CF2*15 + CF1*5 IF ClaimCount GT 30

ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 295 # year 1
YIELD 295 IF RenMonth GTE 12 # year 2
YIELD 780 IF RenMonth GTE 24 # year 3
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-BW
Description: Entry of national phase in Botswana
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BW-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Botswana
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BWP
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; EntitySize

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
LET Fee AS 300
YIELD Fee
YIELD -Fee*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
LET Fee AS 300
YIELD Fee
YIELD -Fee*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
LET RF1 AS 60
LET RF2 AS 240
LET RF3 AS 300

YIELD RF1 # year 1
YIELD -RF1*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100

YIELD RF2 IF RenMonth GTE 12 # year 2
YIELD -RF2*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100

YIELD RF3 IF RenMonth GTE 24 # year 3
YIELD -RF3*0.5 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Person OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less25 OR EntitySize EQ Entity_Less100

ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-BY
Description: Entry of regional phase in Belarus
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BY-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Belarus
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BYN
# MODULES: ISR_AVAILABLE; IndependentClaimCount;

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
LET Fee AS 90.65
YIELD Fee
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
LET CF AS 38.85
YIELD CF*(IndependentClaimCount-1) IF IndependentClaimCount GT 1
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee
LET Fee1 AS 440.30 
LET Fee2 AS 0.5 * Fee1 # 50% Discount if ISR available
LET IndepClaimFee AS 259 # no discount seems to apply here

YIELD Fee1 IF ISR_AVAILABLE NEQ TRUE
YIELD Fee2 IF ISR_AVAILABLE EQ TRUE
YIELD IndepClaimFee*(IndependentClaimCount-1) IF IndependentClaimCount GT 1
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 181.30
ENDCOMPUTE

# no annuities before grant

Name: PCT_BZ
Description: Entry of national phase in Belize
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-BZ-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Belize
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: BZD
# MODULES: ApplicationDate;

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
LET Fee AS 300
YIELD Fee
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_GrantFee OPTIONAL
LET Fee AS 300
YIELD Fee
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today
YIELD 100
YIELD 200 IF RenMonth GTE 12 #year 2
YIELD 300 IF RenMonth GTE 24 #year 3
ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-CA
Description: Entry of national phase in Canada
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-CA-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Canada
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: CAD
# MODULES: ApplicationDate; ISA; EntitySize; 

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 203.59 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small
YIELD 407.18 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Small
ENDCOMPUTE

# ExReq 4 years after IFD
COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee OPTIONAL

CASE ISA EQ ISA_CA AS
   YIELD 100 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small
   YIELD 203.59 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Small
ENDCASE

CASE ISA NEQ ISA_CA AS
   YIELD 407.18 IF EntitySize EQ Entity_Small
   YIELD 814.37 IF EntitySize NEQ Entity_Small
ENDCASE

ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_Renewal
LET RenMonth AS ROUND(ApplicationDate!MONTHSTONOW) #calculate difference in months to today

LET AnnFeeSmall AS 50
LET AnnFeeLarge AS 100

CASE EntitySize EQ Entity_Small AS 
   YIELD AnnFeeSmall #year 2
   YIELD AnnFeeSmall IF RenMonth GTE 12 #year 3
   YIELD AnnFeeSmall IF RenMonth GTE 24 #year 4
ENDCASE

CASE EntitySize NEQ Entity_Small AS 
   YIELD AnnFeeLarge #year 2
   YIELD AnnFeeLarge IF RenMonth GTE 12 #year 3
   YIELD AnnFeeLarge IF RenMonth GTE 24 #year 4
ENDCASE

ENDCOMPUTE

Name: PCT-CH
Description: Entry of national phase in Switzerland
SourceCode:
# File name: PCT-CH-OFF
# File content: Official fees for PCT national phase: Switzerland
# Valid until n/a
# Currency: CHF
# MODULES: ClaimCount

COMPUTE FEE OFF_BasicNationalFee
YIELD 200
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ClaimFee
YIELD 50*(ClaimCount-10) IF ClaimCount GT 10
ENDCOMPUTE

COMPUTE FEE OFF_ExaminationFee OPTIONAL
YIELD 500
ENDCOMPUTE

#annuities only after year 4
